name: Toaster Clicker
description:
Click in the middle of the crosshair to put the mouse where its supposed to be.

Toaster clicker, a short, yet powerfully fulfilling experience. 

Music by me

Subscribe to my channel if you feel like, also if you don't feel like, it is not a choice:
